BatchPutMetrics.name: BatchPutMetrics
BatchPutMetrics.documentation: Used to ingest training metrics into SageMaker which can be visualized in SageMaker Studio and retrieved with the GetMetrics API.

Code.documentation:
The error code of an error that occured when attempting to put metrics.

  • MetricLimitExceeded - The max amount of metrics per resource has been exceeded.

  • InternalError - An internal error occured.

  • ValidationError - The metric data failed validation.

  • ConflictError - Multiple requests attempted to modify the same data simultaneously.

MetricIndex.documentation: An index that corresponds to the metric in the request.

BatchPutMetricsError.documentation: An error that occured when putting the metric data.

TrialComponentName.documentation: The name of Trial Component to associate the metrics with.

MetricData.documentation: A list of raw metric values to put.

Errors.documentation: Any errors that occur when inserting metric data will appear in this.

MetricName.documentation: Name of the metric to be captured. Length of the name should be no greater than 255.

Timestamp.documentation: The time when the metric was recorded.

RawMetricData.documentation: The raw metric data to associate with the resource.

documentation:
Contains all data plane API operations and data types for Amazon SageMaker Metrics. Use these APIs to put and retrieve (get) features related to your training run.

  • BatchPutMetrics
